name: TRELLIX
sampleDescriptions:

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019

Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2020- Provisions relating to cyber security

Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2021 - Provisions relating to cyber security

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2021/22 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community;
Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2021/22 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community.

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2022 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community.

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2023 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2023 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; Senate Select Committee on Intelligence Committee Draft on Intelligence and intelligence-related activities.

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2024 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; VA cyber security concerns.

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2025 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2025 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; VA cyber security concerns.

National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2026 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2026 - Provisions relating to cyber security and the intelligence community; VA cyber security concerns.
